ygData.subject: Land Mine calls Time Bomb via commlink...

OOC: If it's possible to talk to someone durring your repair, then here goe=
s!

BIC: "Time Bomb? Time Bomb? Time Bomb, it's me! it's me Time Bomb, wake=
 up! Please Time Bomb don't die! Please, I can't live without you, you can'=
t die! Time Bomb you promised we would die together, you broke your promise=
, wake up!" Land Mine had called Time Bomb on his commlink and tried to tal=
k to him through it, since she was almost repaired she was awake. She start=
ed to cry but remembered that sometimes CR Tanks interfere with comm calls.=
 She rested easily on the fact that Time Bomb may be alive. She could relax=
 and get repaired, Time Bomb wouldn't leave without her, after all. She wen=
t back to sleep...
